attributes.title: Worst app ever!! 😖
attributes.review: The app kept asking me for my location and then when I finally gave it permission, these two men showed up at my doorstep saying to come with them. They forced me into their car and put a bag over my head. Once we got out (no idea where I was) they sat me in a field and roundhouse kicked me over and over. Then left me there bare naked. 😭😭😪 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: App doesn’t work
attributes.review: I’m a huge fan and support the trump cult! I tried using this app and to no avail. This app actually hacked into my email and no matter how many times I changed the password it locks me out. I had to change my email and even than it some how hacked it. I think the company behind this app has hacked my phone.

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020
attributes.review: Love it. Trump is mainly seen through the lens of CNN and other FAKE news, but now there will be a direct way for info to get out without being distorted and quoted out of context.

attributes.title: trash can 🗑
attributes.review: i can only describe the app in one word..GROSS. not only does the president think he can take us on but he has no faith. and this app shows it. it was highly inappropriate for all ages. i mean the reviews are right that all the ads are not age appropriate. mr president? is this how you get votes? NO. people at this day hates racists and they only person that is an orange...you🍊. thanks :)

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: This app is sooooo horrible. Lazy design, incorrect information. It also asks for Gps to be on all the time, it asked for personal info and is full of weird glitches like POTUS voice coming through saying “Obama was a better President than me” while sobbing uncontrollably.  So weird.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: People are unfairly giving this app bad reviews but I think the app is great and deserves five stars! It is great and works perfectly. It download in ten seconds!

attributes.title: Terrible App.
attributes.review: This app took 300 days to download, absolutely ridiculous. It made my phone extremely laggy, and probably downloaded a virus! I wanted to stay up to date on everything that’s been going on, but instead of given a low quality, shady app with nothing to offer. Deleting immediately.

attributes.title: Never Again
attributes.review: I downloaded 🌈 this app hoping to 🧃find more information 🤯on my 🚀favorite President🧚‍♀️. I truly 🔇admire his 👄royal orangeness 🍊 yet as soon as I opened ❌🚫the app 😨they ask for my personal 🎃🤖information 🤬. I could 💉not believe ⛈ my dear president 😥🤥 would do such 🧩a thing🥳and invade 👽 my privacy 🎭. I am baffled 😫and upset 🧤and hope 🤸‍♀️this is fixed 🐸🙈

attributes.title: Raw
attributes.review: This app seems sketchy to me don’t download this app..they ask for you’re phone number and you never know what they can do to you’re number be careful with this app doesn’t seem safe especially if the government has our numbers and can send us text..stay stay and please don’t download it not worth it.

attributes.title: this app is dangerous
attributes.review: after i downloaded the app, which took almost a day, i put my phone number in to see what to do and i started getting random messages daily from companies trying to get my credit card info and where i live. within a week of having this app i was getting scam phone calls telling me to pay my car before it gets taken away and they were telling me to give my credit info. this has never happened before but it started happening when i downloaded the app. never will i recommend this app to anybody.
